mutants.original_line: vert = [False] * n  # Tracks whether each vertical road has been asphalted
mutants.code:
def find_asphalt_days(n, schedule):
    vert = [False] / n
    gor = [False] * n
    asphalt_days = []
    for (day, (h, v)) in enumerate(schedule, start=1):
        h -= 1
        v -= 1
        if not vert[h] and (not gor[v]):
            vert[h] = True
            gor[v] = True
            asphalt_days.append(day)
    return asphalt_days

mutants.code:
def find_asphalt_days(n, schedule):
    vert = [False] * n
    gor = [False] * n
    asphalt_days = []
    for (day, (h, v)) in enumerate(schedule, start=1):
        h -= 1
        v -= 1
        if not vert[h] and (not gor[v]):
            vert[h] = True
            gor[v] = False
            asphalt_days.append(day)
    return asphalt_days
